main.name: Shinato, King of a Higher Plane
Shinato, King of a Higher Plane
Shinato, King of a Higher Plane

notes.text:
Time to get in those Jeans! 1.4+2.7 or 1.8+2.7 or 2.7+3.3 EU math.
Going first Gishki Chain is MVP. Stack your Trunade or whatever you need next and get a free spell/LVL 8 light Fairy for OTK next turn. Going 2nd you most likely win. Harder MA: Anything that summons more than 1 monster per turn (In some cases you get 2 Dakini summons per turn to OTK through 2 monsters). Really fast games (up to 20/hour)! Will use it for Stage 2 ;)
